messages.message:
Hi Team,

When a new user signs up for AI Hub Pro, do we send an automated email giving them a tour of the platform, tips and tricks, how-to's, etc?   This is the email I got when I tried out a competitor - Sensible (@Matt Weaver).

cc @avi

we have a similar intro PDF provided in the sample converse project if the user is not logged in, but i donâ€™t think this is shown when the user is logged in

Cool idea. Would be a great opportunity to add a _"Would you like to learn more about how AI Hub can help your business? Contact us."_ 
@nikita
